issue.title: Loss choice: instantiate with hydra

repository.name: geo-deep-learning
repository.description: Deep learning applied to georeferenced datasets

issue.body:
See similar issue #246 

Currently, choosing a loss in model_choice.py calls an _init__.py that makes use of a series of disorganized if-else statements.
Choosing a model can be much more straight forward by using config files for each relevant loss and pointing to the model class directly in this config file. See [hydra's documentation on Class instantiation](https://hydra.cc/docs/advanced/instantiate_objects/overview/).

issue.body:
Saving hyperparameters info as dictionary in the saved model will help preserving the training info in future uses of a given model.

Also, writing this issue probably took longer that developping the suggested enhancement.

https://pytorch.org/tutorials/beginner/saving_loading_models.html

issue.body: To prepare for issue #246, deeplabv3's nir injection feature must be done inside model definition and LayersEnsemble() module.

issue.title: Remove unused and unadapted model architecture: TernausNet, FCN_resnet, etc.

milestone.title: Operational data pipeline
milestone.description: Iplement this workflow : Pre-processing new images ->storing COGs in the datacube -> run inference service in a hybrid Kubernetes (Rancher on AWS) and HPC (gpsc3) infrastructure

repository.name: geo-deep-learning
repository.description: Deep learning applied to georeferenced datasets

issue.body:
- [TernausNet](https://github.com/NRCan/geo-deep-learning/blob/develop/models/TernausNet.py) has been unused for many months, maybe even years. It's ready for retirement.
- [FCN_resnet](https://github.com/NRCan/geo-deep-learning/blob/develop/models/model_choice.py#L189) is a [torchvision model](https://pytorch.org/vision/stable/generated/torchvision.models.segmentation.fcn_resnet101.html#torchvision.models.segmentation.fcn_resnet101) unadapted for more than 3 bands. If we want to use it the future, I'd look for a "geospatial-friendly" implementation with the number of bands softcoded.
- [Inception](https://github.com/NRCan/geo-deep-learning/blob/develop/models/inception.py) is a classification network. We've dropped classification in #263 

@victorlazio109, any other model architectures we don't need anymore before I tackle #246 ?

issue.title: Hydra: Create optimizer using instantiate()

repository.name: geo-deep-learning

issue.body: As was done with losses in #255  and as will be done with model architectures in #246, optimizers should be instantiated with hydra's instantiate() function and config parameters should be adapted accordingly.
